document.full_text: the foo fighters finally got their first no. 1 album in the united states on wednesday as their eighth studio release led a field that also included strong debuts from alison krauss and paul simon.
document.title: foo fighters earn first no. 1 album in u.s.
lines_and_colors: the foo fighters finally got their first no. 1 album in the united states on wednesday as their eighth studio release led a field that also included strong debuts from alison krauss and paul simon.
